header.title: ğŸ“ Teacher's Content Assistant
header.subtitle: Transform web content into educational materials

contentSource.chooseLabel: How would you like to load content?

suggestions.summarize: Create a concise summary of the main points from this content.
suggestions.createPodcast: Create a podcast script based on this content, including an introduction, key discussion points, and conclusion.
suggestions.generateQuestions: Create 10 comprehension questions about this content suitable for students.
suggestions.studyGuide: Create a detailed study guide with key terms, main concepts, and important takeaways.
suggestions.quiz: Create a 5-question multiple choice quiz based on this content with answer explanations.

chat.emptyStateTitle: ğŸ‘† Enter a URL or upload a PDF to get started
chat.emptyStateSubtitle: Load content and I'll help you create educational materials from it
chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask me to do something with this content...
chat.inputPlaceholderEmpty: Ask me anything or load content to analyze...
chat.pdfLoadedMessage: I've loaded the PDF content ({pages} pages). You can now ask me to summarize it, create a podcast script, generate questions, or anything else you'd like me to do with this content.
chat.urlLoadedMessage: I've loaded the content from {url}. You can now ask me to summarize it, create a podcast script, generate questions, or anything else you'd like me to do with this content.
